Package server.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardResponseHandler
    Given Game object, GameID, RequestID, return boardResponse String
    ClientDisconnectController
    Controller to detect when terminating client has something to be cleaned up.
    CreateGameRequestController
    Controller on server to handle the create game request and return board response to client.
    ExitGameController
    Controller on server to handle the exit game request and return exit response to client.
    FindWordRequestController
    Controller on server to handle the find word request and return find word response to client.
    JoinGameRequestController
    Controller on server to handle the join game request and return board response to client.
    ListGamesRequestController
    Controller on server to handle the list game request of admin client and return list game response to client.
    LockGameRequestController
    Controller on server to handle the lock game request and return lock game response to client.
    ProtocolHandler
    Implementation of a protocol handler to respond to messages received from clients.
    RepositionBoardRequestController
    Controller on server to handle the reposition board request and return board response to client.
    ResetGameRequestController
    Controller on server to handle the reset game request and return reset game response and board response to client.
    SharedSpaceHandler
    Method to compute how many players share the cell.
    ShowGameStateRequestController
    Controller on server to handle the show game state request of admin client and return board response to client.
